item.title: Owasp Juiceshop
item.description: Some things that were unsolved that I found out in the demo version :) Target: OWASP Juice Shop Bully Chatbot ¶ You have to release your inner nagger and ask repeatedly for coupons :) What worked for me was to type coupons +=1 Repetitive Registration ¶ This one is pretty simple. Fill out everything correctly, then go to the first “Password” field and change it.

item.title: picoCTF web exploitation writeups
item.description: Hey, this is a simple writeup on the challenges provided by picoCTF Hope you find it useful ;) Get aHEAD ¶ For this challenge you should think about the HTTP request methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, HEAD,…) See the HEAD there? Does it look like something you have on the title of the challenge? xP The HEAD gives you the website’s metadata. It should do the same thing as a GET but without all the body, although sometimes they are different.
